3 mos 1 v B 100 dep 50 Mrs S. says she has refunded re-deposited Feb 28 1939 July 26 Spanish House Sept 5 Tales of Jacob Sept 5 Young Joseph Sept 5 Door Between Sept 5 (Taking several for August without extra charge)
Sept 5 Deep Summer Sept. 13 Sept 13 Moon is Feminine Sept 19 Sept 19 Daughter 2v Sept 27 Sept 27 Northwest Passage Oct 14 Oct 14 Brighton Rock 2v Oct 21 " 14 With Malice Toward Some Oct 21 " 21 My Sister Eileen 2- 12v due Oct 27 21 Death of a Heart Nov 3 Nov 3 Midas Touch Nov 10 Sub. ren. 3 m. 1 vol. B 100v Oct 26 Jan 26 1938 1939 Trip to America sub suspended - Has 3 months 2 mos & 160<*> minus one week when returns. 1/2
Feb 21 - May 21st
runs to May 14th 1939 Feb 28 English Rue Mar 13 Mar 13 Flying Dutchman Mar 20 20 North to the Orient 1v 28
To May 14th II SHAPIRO Mar 20 Valiant Woman 28 28 Let Your Mind Alone 1 v 28 28 House of all Nations Apr 3 Apr 3 Fathers Apr 17 3 My Son! My Son! 2v post 3d = 36 pd A Apr 21 17 Insanity Fair owes 36fr pd. May 1 May 1 Christmas Holiday May 8 8 Gracie Allen Murder Case 2v May 15 8 Three Marriages May 15 15 Tree of Liberty May 15 30 Here Lies pd. 2v June 2 June 7 Harlequin House June 16 June 16 Wickford Point June 26 26 Beware of Pity July 7 will renew sub. next time
Renewed May 14 - August 14 1939 B 90v should be 100 owes 10v July 7 Adventures of a Young Man July 18 18 Seasoned Timber Feb. 19 paid ten frs. owed on subs.
phoned Oct 5th = no answer. Keeping deposit meanwhile phoned Jan 30 Mrs Shapiro is coming over
